entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Getting random WebSocket failed connection of Blazor Server Application hosted on an Azure App Service #55442
  • FileStreamResultExecutor does not support DisposeAsync #55441
  • Run the .NET WebAssembly runtime in release mode in published Blazor apps #55438
  • Request Timeouts dynamically calculated #55437
  • Can we trust the `maxAllowedSize` of `IBrowserFile.OpenReadStream`? #55435

Closed

  • Aspire Components APIs #55031
  • Redirect On Signout without making your own Controller #55329
  • Update the qrcode docs for authenticator apps / how to generaten qrcodes for 2fa? #55260
  • CS8103: combined length of user strings used by the program exceeds allowed limit #20224

PullRequests

Created

  • Add separate activities for Hub methods #55439
    area-signalr

Merged

  • Quarantine CheckStdoutWithLargeWrites_TestSink #55432
    area-networking, 9.0-preview5
  • Update build.gradle okhttp dependency #55434
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5
  • Add utf-8 BOM to sln file to force utf-8 encoding #55423
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `5a37b51` to `d83fee1` #55380
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview5
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.5.24229.2 #55416
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • Use built-in OpenAPI support in templates #55343
    area-mvc
  • [H/3] Fix code passed into QuicConnection.CloseAsync and QuicStream.Abort #55282
    area-networking
  • Add support for the Partitioned cookie attribute #55371
    area-networking
  • Delete flaky test MultipleThreadsForceRefresh #55290
    area-dataprotection
  • [release/8.0] Fix duplicate error.type tags in metrics #55301
    Servicing-approved, pending-ci-rerun, area-hosting, 8.0.x
  • DO NOT MERGE - install scripts check #54828
    area-infrastructure
  • Relocate webtransport streams initialisation from HTTP3 connection accept loop to streams type #55425
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Retry `Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.KeyManagement.KeyRingProviderTests.MultipleThreadsForceRefresh` #55228
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
